othello.model.gamestate

Class GameGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • othello.model.gamestate.GameGrid

  • public class GameGrid
extends java.util.Observable
    Class representing the state of a game. Contains mehthods needed to keep the gamestate in a legal state and to progress a game, eg by calculating score, checking if moves are legal and executing a move.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameGrid(int size, java.util.Observer observer)
      Additional constructor to construct a gamegrid of, by user, chosen size.
      GameGrid(java.util.Observer observer)
      Constructor to create a gamegrid of default size

      • isLegalMove

        public boolean isLegalMove(Marker markerToAdd,
                           int i,
                           int j)
        Method checks if suggested suggested move is legal, by using a helper method for checking the different directions
        Parameters:
        markerToAdd, - the marker to be placed in cell
        i, - the row in which the marker is to be placed
        j, - the column in which the marker is to be placed
        Returns:
        true or false

      • flipMarkers

        public void flipMarkers(Marker addedMarker,
                        int i,
                        int j)
        Method performing the marker flip for a valid move that is performed. Uses a helpermethod to flip markers in all valid directions.
        Parameters:
        addedMarker, - the marker to be placed and changed into.
        i, - the row where the the new marker is placed
        j, - the column where the new marker is placed

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        Method checks if gamegrid is full
        Returns:
        true or false

      • calculatePlayerMoves

        public java.util.ArrayList<Point> calculatePlayerMoves(Marker playerMarker)
        Method calculating all valid moves for a specified marker at a certain movement in the game. Collects all moves in a list which is returned.
        Parameters:
        playerMarker, - typer of marker to calculate moves for
        Returns:
        ArrayList, a list with valid moves represented as points
